testcase.classname: I want to add process details for IPO which is having the fabric sheet
testcase.name: Verification of submitting the Yarn working
testcase.system-out: When User navigates to Login page...........................................passed Then User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And navigate to New Fabric Sheet working screen.............................passed And Click on styles expansion...............................................passed And click on IPO in the styles expansion....................................passed And Verify that data is displaying in grids after selecting the IPO.........passed And Click on Edit icon in MU Working grid...................................passed And Verify the Fabric Required is displaying the value or not...............passed And Enter the value in Residual shrinkage...................................passed And click on yarn working checkbox..........................................passed Then Select Yarn Type.......................................................passed And Enter value in knitting and Spinning MU.................................passed Then select the process1 as Other Process...................................passed Then select the process2 as NA..............................................passed And verify the qty in greige field whether value is displaying or not.......passed And verify the text in Other Process name text field........................passed And Enter the value in MU percentage field..................................passed And Enter Fabric Budget details for Yarn process............................passed And Enter Fabric Budget details for knitting and spinning process...........passed And Enter Fabric Budget details for Other process...........................passed And Click on submit button to save the mu working...........................passed
